detectors.description:
MagaToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#92-97) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#94)
detectors.markdown:
[MagaToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#L92-L97) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#L94)

detectors.description:
MagaToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#99-105) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#100)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#102)

detectors.description:

	Possible nodes:

detectors.description: Variable MagaToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#54) is not in mixedCase

MagaToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#64-72) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 2020000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#68)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- MagaToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#74-76)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#23)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- MagaToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#78-80)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#24)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#25)
	- MagaToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#82-84)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#26)
	- MagaToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#92-97)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- MagaToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#86-90)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#27)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#43)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol#43-45)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MagaToken.sol)#86
